title: Pat and Mat RIP-Unleashed [.Dude.]
description:
Pat and Mat: the Game is casual game for PC, Nintendo DS and XBOX360 systems (this is the current status of target platforms and may change in the future). Features never used before brand for video-games and perfect reconstruction of stop-motion TV series assets in interactive world.

Pat and Mat RIP-Unleashed

Pat & Mat: the Game is casual game for PC, Nintendo DS and XBOX360 systems (this is the current status of target platforms and may change in the future). Features never used before brand for video-games and perfect reconstruction of stop-motion TV series assets in interactive world.
